Segment.name: UD
Segment.comment: To identify and describe underwriting status of submitted applications

Field.name: StatusCode1
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of a business transaction, such as a claim, policy, real estate, or securities transaction

Field.name: StatusCode2
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of a business transaction, such as a claim, policy, real estate, or securities transaction

Field.name: UnderwritingDecisionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the decision made by the underwriter

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Description1
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: OfferBasisCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the basis on which the underwriter offers to provide coverage

Field.name: AssignedNumber1
Field.comment: Number assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: OfferBasisCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the basis on which the underwriter offers to provide coverage

Field.name: AssignedNumber2
Field.comment: Number assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: Description2
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode1
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode2
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency
